snippet: Steve Nash, the longtime Phoenix Suns star and part-time New York resident, will join the Lakers, thrusting them back into title contention.
abstract: NBA point guard Steve Nash, the longtime Phoenix Suns star and part-time New York resident, will join the Los Angeles Lakers, thrusting them back into title contention; deal leaves the New York Knicks still searching for a veteran hand to stabilize their offense and to mentor Jeremy Lin, their promising 23-year-old point guard.

byline.original: By HOWARD BECK and NATE TAYLOR

lead_paragraph: Steve Nash, the longtime Phoenix Suns star and part-time New York resident, will join the Lakers, thrusting them back into title contention.

headline.seo: Steve Nash Heads to Lakers, Leaving Knicks in Lurch
headline.main: Nash Heads to Lakers, Leaving Knicks in Lurch
headline.print_headline: Nash Heads to Lakers, Leaving Knicks in Lurch
